aimAssistMaxDist.Wiki: Determines maximum distance before aim assist will no longer occur.

aimAssistInputTargetDist_Stage0.Wiki: Determines which target distance ranges will use which aim assist values.

aimAssistInputTargetDist_Stage1.Wiki: Determines which target distance ranges will use which aim assist values.

aimAssistInputTargetDist_Stage2.Wiki: Determines which target distance ranges will use which aim assist values.

aimAssistInputTargetDist_Stage3.Wiki: Determines which target distance ranges will use which aim assist values.

aimAssistInputTargetDist_Stage4.Wiki: Determines which target distance ranges will use which aim assist values.

aimAssistGrowVal_Stage0.Wiki: Effectiveness of Aim Assist when target distance equals stage 0.\nValue will grow from stage 0 to stage 1 until stage 1 target distance is met.

aimAssistGrowVal_Stage1.Wiki: Effectiveness of Aim Assist when target distance equals stage 1.\nValue will grow from stage 1 to stage 2 until stage 2 target distance is met.\nValue is used for Close-Range Assist in UI.

aimAssistGrowVal_Stage2.Wiki: Effectiveness of Aim Assist when target distance equals stage 2.\nValue will grow from stage 2 to stage 3 until stage 3 target distance is met.

aimAssistGrowVal_Stage3.Wiki: Effectiveness of Aim Assist when target distance equals stage 3.\nValue will grow from stage 3 to stage 4 until stage 4 target distance is met.\nValue is used for Medium-Range Assist in UI.

aimAssistGrowVal_Stage4.Wiki: Effectiveness of Aim Assist when target distance equals stage 4.\nIf target distance exceeds stage 4, value remains at stage 4 until target distance exceeds aimAssistMaxDist.\nValue is used for Long-Range Assist in UI.
